casebody.data:
449 A.2d 70 COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Anthony M. JOHNSON, Appellant. No. 2249

October Term, 1979.

Superior Court of Pennsylvania. Aug. 10, 1982.

ORDER OF COURT

PER CURIAM:

AND NOW, to-wit, this 10th day of August, 1982, Appellant’s Petition for Permission to file Application for Reargu*46ment En Banc Nunc Pro Tunc is denied, Pa.Super., 441 A.2d 784.
